short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Change your desktop wallpaper directly from Chrome! Choose your favorite picture from the internet (Windows only)

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension works with a native application (Python) and messaging host, allowing it to make changes to your computer. More details are provided in the options page.

Additional features:
Save recent wallpaper to your downloads
